nycTheatreExcerpt: In one of the quirkiest, most morbid and somehow loveliest musicals to hit Broadway this season  even Floyd Collins dying spelunker plot seems conventional by comparison  Dead Outlaw, directed by David Cromer (whose work here surpasses his accomplishments on Good Night, And Good Luck), is a very late entry in Broadway's 2024-2025 season, and absolutely one of the best.
